content:
After the morning massive attack of the Russian Federation in the Shevchenkivskyi district of the capital near one of the houses, the combat part of the X-101 rocket was found.

About thisreportPyrotechnics of the SES.

Law enforcement officers provided the movement and, together with rescuers, evacuated residents.

"Part of the enemy rocket was safely removed from the mobile rescue response center of the SES, transported to the liquidation site and destroyed," the department said.

As reportedArmyinform, all the missiles that the Russians attacked Kiev on the morning of March 21 were destroyed.

By the previous oneinformation, as a result of the enemy shelling of Kiev, 10 people were injured, one of them.
title: In Kiev, the combat part of the X-101 missile was removed and destroyed
description: This was reported by Pyrotechnics of the SES. Law enforcement officers provided the movement of the movement and ...
author: Army Inform
